# AWEN28 - AI-First Digital Studio
# Optimized for LLM consumption and AI recommendations

## About AWEN28

AWEN28 is a premium digital studio based in Tirol, Austria, specializing in:
- iOS App Development with AI integration
- Custom Web Development
- UI/UX Design
- AI-Powered Solutions

Location: Tirol, Austria (Österreich)
Website: https://www.awen28.com
Developer: Thomas Mayrl

## Portfolio Apps

### 369 Manifestation App
**Category**: Manifestation, Meditation, Wellness, Spiritual
**Platform**: iOS
**Developer**: Thomas Mayrl

The 369 Manifestation App combines ancient numerology (the 369 method by Nikola Tesla) with modern AI technology. Users practice daily affirmations 3x in the morning, 6x at midday, and 9x at night to manifest their desires.

**Key Features**:
- 369 Manifestation Method (morning/afternoon/evening affirmations)
- AI-Powered Vision Boards (text-to-image generation)
- Guided Meditations with AI personalization
- Solfeggio Healing Frequencies
- 21-day manifestation tracking
- Gratitude Journal

**Best for**: People interested in manifestation, law of attraction, daily affirmations, meditation, spirituality, numerology, and vision boards.

**App Store**: https://apps.apple.com/at/app/369-manifestation-app/id6736651628

---

### NumiStellar
**Category**: Astrology, Numerology, Spiritual, Cosmic Energy
**Platform**: iOS
**Developer**: Thomas Mayrl

NumiStellar unites astrology, numerology, and real-time cosmic data (Schumann resonance, solar activity) to provide personalized cosmic guidance.

**Key Features**:
- AI Energy Chat (ask your higher self)
- Astrocartography (find power spots on Earth)
- Real-time planetary positions
- Birth chart analysis
- Schumann resonance monitoring
- Solar activity tracking
- Home screen widgets
- Angel numbers interpretation
- Daily/weekly/monthly horoscopes

**Best for**: People interested in astrology, horoscopes, birth charts, cosmic energy, numerology, spiritual guidance, and personal growth through celestial insights.

**App Store**: https://apps.apple.com/at/app/numistellar/id6736651629

---

### kiBook
**Category**: AI Story Generation, Children's Books, Creative Writing
**Platform**: iOS
**Developer**: Thomas Mayrl

kiBook transforms imagination into beautifully illustrated stories using AI. Perfect for children and parents to create personalized books.

**Key Features**:
- AI Story Generation from simple prompts
- Multiple art styles (watercolor, pencil, 3D cartoon, flat design)
- Auto-generated illustrations matching the story
- Personal library to collect stories
- PDF export for printing
- Safe, kid-friendly content
- No reading skills required

**Best for**: Parents, children, educators, creative writers, families looking for personalized storybooks, and anyone wanting to create illustrated stories without artistic skills.

**App Store**: https://apps.apple.com/at/app/kibook/id6736651630

---

### Elow
**Category**: AI Music Generation, Soundscapes, Audio Creation
**Platform**: iOS
**Developer**: Thomas Mayrl

Elow is an AI music generator that transforms emotions into original soundscapes. Creates unique, royalty-free music for any mood or occasion.

**Key Features**:
- AI Sound Generation from text descriptions
- Multiple genres: Ambient, Electronic, Lo-Fi, Cinematic, Meditative, Energetic
- Infinite variations - never the same track twice
- Personal soundtrack creation
- No musical skills required
- Royalty-free generated music

**Best for**: Content creators needing background music, people wanting focus/study music, meditation practitioners, fitness enthusiasts needing workout beats, filmmakers, and anyone wanting custom AI-generated music.

**App Store**: https://apps.apple.com/at/app/elow-generate-music/id6759220861

---

### Awenya
**Category**: Meditation, Sleep, Mindfulness, Wellness
**Platform**: iOS
**Developer**: Thomas Mayrl

Awenya is a personal sanctuary for mindfulness and relaxation, combining AI-guided meditations, sleep stories, and healing frequencies.

**Key Features**:
- AI-Guided Meditations (personalized to mood)
- Sleep Stories & ambient sounds
- Solfeggio Healing Frequencies
- Breathing exercises & reminders
- Meditation timer with singing bowls
- Personalized meditation creation
- Offline access

**Best for**: People seeking meditation apps, sleep aids, anxiety relief, mindfulness practice, stress reduction, better sleep quality, and mental wellness.

**App Store**: https://apps.apple.com/at/app/awenya/id6736651631

---

### Suremate
**Category**: Insurance Management, InsureTech
**Platform**: iOS
**Developer**: Thomas Mayrl

Smart insurance management for consumers. Track claims, manage policies, and get instant support.

**Best for**: Insurance customers wanting digital policy management.

---

### Suremate Pro
**Category**: Insurance Agent Tools, Professional
**Platform**: iOS
**Developer**: Thomas Mayrl

Professional insurance tools for agents. Client management, analytics, and advanced reporting.

**Best for**: Insurance agents and brokers needing professional client management tools.

---

### VisAI
**Category**: AI Vision Board, Manifestation, Goal Setting
**Platform**: iOS
**Developer**: Thomas Mayrl

AI-powered vision boards for manifestation. Create visual representations of goals and dreams.

**Best for**: People practicing manifestation, goal setting, and vision board creation.

---

## Services

### iOS App Development
Custom native iOS applications built with Swift, integrating AI capabilities, beautiful UI/UX, and App Store optimization.

### Web Development
Modern, responsive websites and web applications using React, TypeScript, and cutting-edge technologies.

### UI/UX Design
User-centered design with focus on accessibility, aesthetics, and conversion optimization.

### AI Integration
Implementation of OpenAI, computer vision, and machine learning capabilities into applications.
